short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit any image from your computer quickly and efficiently right from Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chramshoot Image Editor is a versatile Chrome extension designed for effortless screen capture editing, while also offering robust tools to edit any image on your computer. Whether you're fine-tuning a screenshot or enhancing a photo, you can easily adjust brightness, contrast, and apply effects like black and white or sepia. The extension also lets you crop images and make reversible adjustments, delivering a professional-grade editing experience.
